title: Segv fault with nested closure

labels.name: I-crash
labels.description: Issue: The compiler crashes (SIGSEGV, SIGABRT, etc). Use I-ICE instead when the compiler panics.

body:
7ffb2cb adds a nest closure invocation (https://github.com/mozilla/rust/commit/7ffb2cb#L1R206), boxed closure calls another closure. This leads a segv fault when "--time-passes" option is specified.

